thread.section_title: Wiggle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wiggle | wiggle.com.au
thread.title: Darren

author: Darren
title: Darren
text: Firstly I ordered the wrong item. I contacted their customer service and was able have the order cancelled prior to shipping. The refund back via PayPal was quick. I re-ordered the correct items (Ã—2 tubes). Unfortunately they shipped the wrong item. Once i contact customer service and provided the photos as proof, the correct item was dispatched without further issue. Everyone can make mistakes. Great customer service was able to help on both occasions. Highly recommended.
